channel.title: data storage on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in data storage on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
EMTEC Logo
EMTEC is part of the Dexxon Group headquartered in Gennevilliers, France and markets consumer computer data storage products and other computer related consumables. Dexxon Group’s North American subsidiary, Dexxon Digital Storage Inc. is located in Lewis Center, Ohio. EMTEC evolved from BASF Magnetics producing magnetic tapes. Between 1998 and 2002 all of BASF’s cassette lineup were rebranded EMTEC. While cassette manufacture has since ceased in 2005, and reel-to-reel tape operations were sold to RMGI, EMTEC continues to manufacture other recordable media such as optical discs, MiniDV and VHS cassettes, USB 2.
You can download theEMTEClogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: EMTEC
item.description: EMTEC is part of the Dexxon Group headquartered in Gennevilliers, France and markets consumer computer data storage products and other computer related consumables. Dexxon Group’s North American subsidiary, Dexxon Digital Storage Inc. is located in Lewis Center, Ohio. EMTEC evolved from BASF Magnetics producing magnetic tapes. Between 1998 and 2002 all of BASF’s cassette lineup were rebranded EMTEC. While cassette manufacture has since ceased in 2005, and reel-to-reel tape operations were sold to RMGI, EMTEC continues to manufacture other recordable media such as optical discs, MiniDV and VHS cassettes, USB 2.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
OpenIO Logo
OpenIO was founded in 2015 by Laurent Denel, Jean-François Smigielski, and five other co-founders, to offer an object storage solution for building hyper-scalable IT infrastructure for a wide range of applications. They have leveraged open source software, developed since 2006, based on a grid technology that enables dynamic behaviour and supports heterogenous hardware. In October 2017 OpenIO completed a $5 million funding round. In July 2020 OpenIO has been acquired by OVH.
You can download theOpenIOlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: OpenIO
item.description: OpenIO was founded in 2015 by Laurent Denel, Jean-François Smigielski, and five other co-founders, to offer an object storage solution for building hyper-scalable IT infrastructure for a wide range of applications. They have leveraged open source software, developed since 2006, based on a grid technology that enables dynamic behaviour and supports heterogenous hardware. In October 2017 OpenIO completed a $5 million funding round. In July 2020 OpenIO has been acquired by OVH.

Storage Technology Corporation Logo Storage Technology Corporation was a data storage technology company headquartered in Louisville, Colorado. New products include data retention systems, which it calls “information lifecycle management”. Source
You can download theStorageTeklogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.description: Storage Technology Corporation was a data storage technology company headquartered in Louisville, Colorado. New products include data retention systems, which it calls “information lifecycle management”. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Hitachi Data Systems Logo
Hitachi Data Systems was a provider of modular mid-range and high-end computer data storage systems, software and services. Its operations are now a part of Hitachi Vantara. It was a wholly owned subsidiary of Hitachi Ltd. and part of the Hitachi Information Systems & Telecommunications Division. In 2017 its operations were merged with Pentaho and Hitachi Insight Group to form Hitachi Vantara. In 2010 Hitachi Data Systems sold through direct and indirect channels in more than 170 countries and regions.
You can download theHitachi Data Systemslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Hitachi Data Systems
item.description: Hitachi Data Systems was a provider of modular mid-range and high-end computer data storage systems, software and services. Its operations are now a part of Hitachi Vantara. It was a wholly owned subsidiary of Hitachi Ltd. and part of the Hitachi Information Systems & Telecommunications Division. In 2017 its operations were merged with Pentaho and Hitachi Insight Group to form Hitachi Vantara. In 2010 Hitachi Data Systems sold through direct and indirect channels in more than 170 countries and regions.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Advanced Energy Logo Advanced Energy Industries, Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Denver, Colorado that develops precision power conversion, measurement and control technologies for the manufacture of semiconductors, flat panel displays, data storage products, telecommunications network equipment, industrial coatings, medical devices, solar cells and architectural glass. Source
You can download theAdvanced Energylogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
